name: In The House of My Brother
name_original: In The House of My Brother
description:
You wake up in darkness next to a twin brother you don't remember having. You cannot tell if he is angry or terrified. And every time you speak, he desperately tries to shut you up. Can you get your bearings and find out what is happening...in the house of your brother?

Gameplay

Click on the large white bold text or on images to advance. Images may enforce a brief delay before they may be clicked.

Content warning: Violence, disturbing imagery and sounds, implied suicide.

Credits

Written, designed and created by SeedBolt Studios.

Narrative design consultation by Kevin Snow.

Creative assistant - Mauricio Marces

Cast:  

You - Devon Talbott             Brother - Tommy McKiernan

Grandpa Tom - Robert W. Smith            Mother - Nick Raynor
